Prices

Which services would you like to book?

Our main services provided are Hair and Eyelash Extensions, we aim to deliver the best service for an affordable price. you can easily book your appointment now or request a call back, so we can understand and advise you on the best of our knowledge.

Eyelash Extensions

We provide 3 types of eyelash extensions, those being Classic, Hybrid and Russian Eyelashes.

Hair Extensions

We provide 3 types of Hair Extensions, those being LA Weave, Microrings and Nano-Rings.
